strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<se_low>*: I bought in a load of snakeskin whips by mistake a while back. Couldn't sell 'em all of course.

<se_low>*: I racked my brains tryin' to figure out a way to get rid of 'em.<page>*: And then I stumbled on an alchemy recipe to turn 'em into dragontail whips!<page>*: Can't tell you what it is, mind.
<se_low>*: I suppose I could give you a hint. They're called dragontail so they're obviously made from part of a dragon. Two parts to be precise.
<se_low>*: I was too scared to sleep... If only I could be holding a woman instead.
<se_def>*: Erm, it's not how it looks. There's nothing weird going on, I swear. Don't go getting the wrong idea now.
